dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2082 IH: For the relief of Daniela Vargas.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Thompson of Mississippi introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: For the relief of Daniela Vargas.

section.header: Waiver of grounds for removal of, or denial of admission to, Daniela Vargas

subsection.text: Notwithstanding sections 212(a) and 237(a) of the Immigration and Nationality Act, Daniela Vargas may not be removed from the United States, or denied admission to the United States, by reason of any act of hers, or on her behalf during the period of infancy, that is a ground for removal or denial of admission and is reflected in the records of the Department of Homeland Security, or the Visa Office of the Department of State, on the date of the enactment of this Act.

subsection.header: Rescission of outstanding order of removal
subsection.text: The Secretary of Homeland Security shall rescind any outstanding order of removal, or any finding that Daniela Vargas is inadmissible or subject to removal, that has been entered against Daniela Vargas by reason of any act described in subsection (a).
